name: Pinot Noir Beef Skewers
description: Rather than a big roast, try these lighter, easier, oven-broiled skewers.

ingredients.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning or Shish Kebab Seasoning

preparation:
1. Combine first 3 ingredients in Multipurpose Pot. Heat until Red Pepper Jelly melts and flavours are combined. Cool to room temperature.
  2. Add beef to marinade. Refrigerate a minimum of two hours, or overnight.
  3. Soak bamboo skewers in water for a minimum of 1 hour.
  4. Thread marinated beef onto Skewers and season with Sea Salt and Pepper.
  5. Preheat oven to broil and cook skewers to desired doneness, approximately 1â€“3 minutes per side.
  6. Pour remaining marinade into pot, heat to boiling and simmer until reduced by half. Brush marinade over broiled skewers and serve.
